thread.title: Fras-le announces results for the year ended 2017 and 4Q17

author: cnbc.com
title: Fras-le announces results for the year ended 2017 and 4Q17
text:
CAXIAS DO SUL, Brazil, March 13, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Fras-le S.A. (B3 – "FRAS3"), a member of the Randon Companies, the largest manufacturer of friction materials in Latin America and a leader worldwide, announces its results for the fourth quarter and year ended 2017. The Company's financial information is consolidated in accordance with International Financial Reporting Standards – IFRS.
PRINCIPAL RESULTS – 2017 | 4Q17
(Percentages indicate variations with the same periods of 2016 – amounts in millions of reais)
Consolidated net income:
2017: R$ 832.8 (+2.5%) | 4Q17: R$ 221.5 (+13.7%)
Net revenues in the domestic market:
2017: R$ 418.1 (+13.1%) | 4Q17: R$ 118.4 (+26.0%)
Net revenues in the international market:
2017: R$ 414.7 (-6.4%) 4Q17: R$ 103.1 (+2.2%)
Billing External Market (Exports + Foreign Operations):
2017: US$ 129.5 (+2.1%) | 4Q17: US$ 31.9 (+22.7%)
Consolidated gross income:
2017: R$ 217.2 (-6.4%) | 4Q17: R$ 60.3 (+20.4%)
Operating Income:
2017: R$ 65.2 (-21.9%) | 4Q17: R$ 15.8 (+259.8%)
EBITDA:
2017: R$ 106.4 (-13.9%) | 4Q17: R$ 29.0 (+102.7%)
Consolidated net income:
2017: R$ 64.2 (-0.5%) | 4Q17: R$ 10.5 (-5.6%)
CONFERENCE CALL TO DISCUSS RESULTS
(In Portuguese, with simultaneous interpretation into English)
March 13, 2018 (Tuesday):
11:00 a.m. (Brasília) | 10:00 a.m. New York | 2:00 p.m. London
Dial-in with connections in Brazil: +55 11 3193-1001 or +55 11 2820-4001| Password: FRAS-LE;
